header_section.title: Transaction Paypal 24 hours
header_section.description: The largest Buy Sell Paypal in Indonesia easily anytime and anywhere instantly 24 hours without holidays and has been integrated with 61 of the best banks in Indonesia

liquiditas.title: High Liquidity
liquiditas.content: No need to ask for stock or availability of Paypal balance. Triv guarantees that no matter number of purchase and sales, our stock is always available. Our system helps your transaction instantly 24/7.

regulator.title: Regulated and Trusted Broker
regulator.content: Since 2015 Triv has been used by millions of people, all customer funds in our system are insured by Bitgo and Lloyd England for 100 million USD or equivalent to 1.45 trillion rupiah.Triv is an official broker registered and supervised by Bappebti.

layanan_section.title: What You can do with Paypal in Triv
layanan_section.content: Triv supports various types of transactions and not just buying and selling paypal. You can swap, exchange or top up your Paypal balance in one application.

jual_beli.title: 24/7 Buy & Sell Paypal Balance
jual_beli.content: Unlike trading stocks and commodities, Triv Exchange is open 24/7. It allows you to buy, sell and exchange Paypal balance in real time through banking/ e-wallet instantly anytime and anywhere.

kirim.title: Instant overseas transfer
kirim.content: You can use Paypal balance to transfer money abroad instantly and free of charge. You may compare with traditional remittance agency needs 1 or 2 days for this transaction, meanwhile Triv works in seconds.

terima.title: International Online Shopping
terima.content: Paypal is accepted by millions of overseas merchants, so you can shop online without the need for a credit card. Just top up Paypal balance in Triv, and you can access international markets and shop in minutes.

hoddl.title: Digital USD Wallet
hoddl.content: There are 65+ supported digital assets in Triv platform and counting. Need exchange to Paypal? Easy! Just access swap menu in Triv app.

swap.title: Swap Paypal Balance
swap.content: There are 65+ supported digital assets in Triv platform and counting. Need exchange to Paypal? Easy! Just access swap menu in Triv app.

isi_pulsa.title: Get Cash back & Protection
isi_pulsa.content: You can shop in the International online merchants with your Paypal balance. Paypal offers cash back and insurance protection for your online shopping. All Paypal transactions are safe and insured.

live_chat.title: Average LiveChat Responds
live_chat.content: Triv's Livechat and Call center are ready to assist you?

processing.title: Average Processing Time
processing.content: All Triv transactions run automatically and without downtime. Since 2015, Triv has never experienced downtime that disrupts customer transactions

ewallet_section.title: Triv Supports 100 banks & E-wallets in Indonesia for all our transactions
ewallet_section.subtitle: 24/7 Real Time Deposit & Withdrawal
ewallet_section.description: All Triv rupiah deposits and withdrawals are processed instantly within minutes to various banks and e-wallets.Need funds in the middle of the night? Done! No need to wait until the next day.Unlike the stock and mutual fund markets, digital assets do not have holidays, all deposit and withdrawal transactions are processed 24 hours including on holidays.

start_now_section.title: Start Investing Now
start_now_section.description: Sign up in minutes and achieve your investment goals nowðŸš€

triv_affliate.content_1: With our Affiliate program every time your downline makes a transaction, you will get 10% cashback unconditionally!
triv_affliate.content_2: Triv Affiliates have no expiration date and are valid for life, as long as your downline makes transactions, you will continue to earn commissions without time limit.
triv_affliate.follow_text: Invite friends and earn extra income
